post.title: My MSDN Article
post.content: Just got a call from my parents – my father’s copy of MSDN Magazine with my article just arrived today. (Yes it’s true, I followed in the “family business” of software development). Mine hasn’t shown up yet nor is it published online yet, but it’s very cool to know it’s on it’s way.
